meanings.definition: To attract and hold (a substance) by adsorption.
meanings.sent1: The sponge was adsorbing water quickly.
meanings.sent2: The charcoal is adsorbing the toxins from the air.
meanings.sent3: The magnet seemed to be adsorbing all the paperclips in the room!
meanings.sent4: Her captivating smile was adsorbing all the attention in the room.
meanings.sent5: The black hole was adsorbing everything in its path, even light.

meanings.sent1: The adsorbing material was perfect for cleaning up spills.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel was adsorbing the spilled juice effectively.
meanings.sent3: The adsorbing superhero could soak up any liquid in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her adsorbing personality made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The adsorbing fabric was great for soaking up excess moisture.
